eu.trentorise.smartcampus.osm.android.views.overlay

Class SafeDrawOverlay

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.trentorise.smartcampus.osm.android.views.overlay.Overlay
      • eu.trentorise.smartcampus.osm.android.views.overlay.SafeDrawOverlay
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OverlayConstants
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CompassOverlay, ItemizedOverlay, MyLocationNewOverlay, ScaleBarOverlay, TilesOverlay

    public abstract class SafeDrawOverlay
extends Overlay
    An overlay class that uses the safe drawing canvas to draw itself and can be zoomed in to high levels without drawing issues.
    See Also:
    ISafeCanvas}
